original_text: Do you not know what I and my fathers have done to all the peoples of other lands? Were the gods of the nations of those lands at all able to deliver their lands out of my hand?
korean_text: 나와 내 조상들이 이방 모든 백성들에게 행한 것을 너희가 알지 못하느냐 모든 나라의 신들이 능히 그들의 땅을 내 손에서 건져낼 수 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: what I and my fathers have done
to all the peoples of other lands?
Were the gods of the nations of those lands
at all able to deliver their lands
sentences.korean_translation: 조금이라도 그들의 땅을 건져낼 수 있었더냐
